ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Ghoul Assassin Advice?
ygData.msgSnippet: Just going from rough memory, I think I camped the room for a good 2 hours before I got my guise (not mask - heh).  In that time we got place holders and or
ygData.messageBody:
Just going from rough memory, I think I camped the room for a good 2 hours
before I got my guise (not mask - heh). In that time we got place holders
and or nada loots from the named. Something is on the 34 min cycle but it
wont always be the Assassin with a mask or dirk.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Illian [mailto:jeff@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 1:51 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Ghoul Assassin Advice?

From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>

Did they change the spawn on the assassin and supplier?
Last time I was
there it was 34 minutes. We had a stretch where we got 4
assassins (all
with the mask :( ), and 5 suppliers ( all with the bag :( )
in a row...
That was maybe 3 months ago, so maybe they changed the spawn
times in there
since...
